author: John Brandon
title: Remote working and health and safety
description: Remote working: Here’s what the law says when it comes to health and safety.
content: Were living in a whole new world. As many employees have shifted to a home office and are under stay-at-home orders, there are legal questions about who is responsible for employee health and safety. In many ways, now that most of us are stuck at home working… [+5875 chars]
